item.description: I read a lot. This post contains some links to documents that every tester should read.

item.title: Reasons to create Unit Tests
item.description: Writing unit tests for API’s is a waste of time. While developing an API it looks so. Today I need to rewrite some calls and all my tests fail. I need to update all the unit tests. If I did not have to write tests, my code was already finished. But that is a mistake.

item.title: Test Reports are Dead
item.description: Testing should deliver usefull information about our products we test. But the usefull information is placed in boring documents who are not very clear to the reader. So The message that we want to tell is not remembered. Can this be different?

item.title: Swiping on a touch screen
item.description: We had already a few months a problem on the machines touchscreen that our interface behaved differently with a finger swipe as with a mouse drag and drop.
